title: Donation of Air-Conditioner at Boso Health Centre
content: Stakeholders responded to the request of the staff of Boso Health Centre by donating an Air Conditioner for the Accounts Office. The District Director of Health Service recieved this on behalf of the facility and acknowledged the donors.

title: World HIV/AIDS Day Activities
content: Staff across the district united to mark the World HIV/AIDS Day, raising awarenes about the disease to save lives.

title: District-wide Immunization Exercise
content: The Directorate conducted a successful immunization campaign across all sub-districts.
